name: CSU Building Histories
show_cols: Name of building, Image links,URL, Architect, Former Names, Date built, Date demolished, Brief Description, Registry status, Additional Resources,Blueprints
disclaimer:
Welcome to the Colorado State Universities (CSU) Building Histories Interactive Map. This project is a joint effort between CSU Libraries Archives and Special Collections and the Geospatial Centroid.

Materials referenced for this project were made possible by the book CSU's Sense of Place: A Campus History of Colorado's Land-Grant University, by James E. Hansen, Linda Meyer, and "Hap" Hazard.

Sarah Payne lead the adaptation of this book into a Story Map and digital collection.


Special thanks to Vicky Lopez-Terrill for making these building histories publicly available online, Linda Meyer for making this information tabular, and Rio Teuber for adding additional content and joining the historicial information with geospatial building footprints.
Thanks also to Edward Henry for sharing his research identifying the location of the claim building.

The information in this interactive map is also available in tabular form, and the building footprints data are available as a geojson file.
